Reference

Habitat Functions

Functions that create habitat estimates given flow and some additional helper functions.

set_spawning_habitat()

Set Spawning Habitat Area

set_instream_habitat()

Set Instream Habitat Area

set_floodplain_habitat()

Set Floodplain Habitat Area

set_bypass_habitat()

Set Bypass Habitat Area

wua_to_area()

WUA to Area in Square Meters

apply_suitability()

Apply Suitability Factor

square_meters_to_acres()

Square Meters to Acres

acres_to_square_meters()

Acres to Square Meters

get_weeks_flooded()

Duration of Floodplain Inundation

get_habitat_selector()

Get Habitat Selector

Habitat Datasets

Flow to area rearing and spawning modeled relationships

habitat_data

Habitat Data

sacramento_habitat

Mainstem Sacramento River Habitat Data

bypass_habitat

Bypass Flow to Habitat Area Relationships

Miscellaneous Datasets

Datasets used as reference tables

modeling_exist

Habitat Modeling Status

watershed_lengths

Habitat Extent Lengths

weeks_inundated

Flow Thresholds for Number of Weeks Inundated

inchannel_habitat_adult

Steelhead Adult Rearing Habitat

pools

Pool Area

Model Input Data

Data used directly as inputs to the DSM model

Fry Inchannel Habitat

Spawning Habitat

Floodplain Habitat

weeks_flooded

Floodplain Habitat Activation Duration

delta_habitat

Delta Habitat Array

sutter_habitat yolo_habitat

Bypass Habitat Area

tisdale_bypass_watershed yolo_bypass_watershed south_delta_routed_watersheds

Watershed Routing

prop_high_predation prob_strand_early prob_strand_late prob_nest_scoured

Expert Estimated Probabilities

contact_points delta_contact_points

Number of Contact Points

delta_prop_high_predation

Probability High Predation in the Deltas
